thread.title: BRIEF-Guiyang Longmaster Information & Technology sees FY 2018 Q1 net profit up 20 pct to 40 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guiyang Longmaster Information & Technology sees FY 2018 Q1 net profit up 20 pct to 40 pct

organizations.name: guiyang longmaster information & technology co ltd

text:
April 10 (Reuters) - Guiyang Longmaster Information & Technology Co Ltd
* Says it sees FY 2018 Q1 net profit to increase by 20 percent to 40 percent, or to be 19.3 million yuan to 22.5 million yuan
* Says FY 2017 Q1 net profit was 16.1 million yuan
* Comments that increased income from telecom value-added business and mobile communications resale business as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/HmTpLi
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
